description: SAP professionals design, implement and deploy SAP solutions to achieve defined business goals. Maintain skills in SAP applications process design and configuration; SAP application design, development, integration, testing and deployment; and SAP application technical architecture.

We are seeking a proactive Compliance Program Manager to ensure adherence to healthcare regulations while supporting our mission to transform respiratory care. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in healthcare compliance and thrive in a fast-paced startup environment.

What is Ansible Health?
Ansible Health unites physicians, nurses, respiratory therapists, and tech experts from Columbia, Johns Hopkins, Google, Amazon, and other top institutions to revolutionize care for chronic disease patients. We combine elite clinical expertise with cutting-edge technology to deliver personalized, efficient care at scale. Our team's groundbreaking research, published in leading journals like Nature and PLOS, demonstrates our commitment to innovation. Backed by Bessemer, First Round Capital, AlleyCorp, Breyer Capital, and Inflect Capital, we're a Series A startup partnering with leading healthcare systems nationwide. Our mission is to genuinely improve patient outcomes, not just optimize metrics. If you're passionate about transforming healthcare through technology, join our diverse team in making a real impact.


The Job at a Glance
We are seeking a highly skilled Compliance Program Manager to join our dynamic team. This role is crucial in ensuring Ansible Health's adherence to healthcare regulations and industry standards while supporting our mission to revolutionize respiratory care. The ideal candidate will bring a strong background in healthcare compliance, coupled with the ability to thrive in a fast-paced startup environment.


Responsibilities

  • Handle US annual reporting and ensure timely and accurate submissions.
  • Monitor and ensure compliance with federal, state, and local tax regulations.
  • Provide expert guidance on tax compliance issues and interpret tax laws for stakeholders across the organization.
  • Develop and implement tax-related policies and procedures to ensure ongoing compliance with changing tax laws.
  • Prepare and present tax compliance reports and insights to senior management.
  • Address and resolve any tax-related issues, discrepancies, or audits from tax authorities.
  • Lead tax planning initiatives to minimize tax liabilities while ensuring full compliance.
  • May change to various programs if the organization's tax compliance is up-to-date.


Education
Bachelor's degree in any relevant field.

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in any relevant field of Finance or Accounting; Master’s degree in Taxation or Accounting is preferred but - not required.
  • Proven experience in US tax compliance, accounting, and multi-state regulations is a must.
  • Strong understanding of U.S. annual reporting requirements.
  • Exceptional communication skills, both written and verbal, for collaborating with internal teams and external vendors and stakeholders.
  • Technologically savvy, with advanced proficiency in Google Workspace and tax softwares.
  • Demonstrated leadership abilities and the initiative to drive tax compliance strategies.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
  • Background in a startup company is a plus.
  • Knowledge of the U.S. healthcare system is a plus.


Job Details
Full-time: 40 hours a week
Benefits: Flexible PTO and healthcare benefits.
Level: Mid-Career, 3-5 years relevant work experience
Location: Remote (offshore, and willing to work Pacific/Eastern hours)

9. Subsidi Komunikasi*

10. Program Kepemilikan Motor*

11. Program Kepemilikan Mobil*

12. Dan Masih Banyak Lagi*

• Strengthen the application and environment security, applying standards and best practices and providing tooling to make development workflows more secure
  • Create, maintain and iterate on the CI/CD processes for new and/or existing system
  • Increase the sophistication of alerting and escalation mechanisms
  • Keep up to date on modern technologies and trends and advocate for the inclusion within systems
  • Help increase system performance with a focus on high availability and scalability
  • Propose, scope, design and implement various infrastructure architectures
  • Work collaboratively with multiple agile teams to help deliver end-to-end products and features, seeing through from conception to delivery

  • Help define, document, evolve and evangelize high engineering standards and best practices across multiple areas.
  • Move quickly and intelligently – seeing technical debt as ‘nemesis’

job_title: Cook RTE, Hot Kitchen, Sushi, Bakery, Pizza & Barista
description:
Detail Pekerjaan:

  • Menyiapkan bahan-bahan yang akan digunakan dalam mengolah dan memasak.
  • Memasak & melakukan presentasi yang bagus dengan memperhatikan nilai platting untuk menarik minat customer.
  • Membuat berbagai jenis minuman Coffee
  • Menjaga kebersihan dan keteraturan lingkungan di dapur, memastikan semua makanan dan barang-barang lainnya disimpan dengan benar.
  • Mengontrol stok dan melakukan pemesanan jika ada kekurangan.
  • Melaksanakan tugas lain yang diperlukan guna kelancaran operasional pekerjaaan.

job_title: Overseas Education Counselor Sales Malang Branch
description:
• Advise and assist students choosing the right overseas study destination.
  • Provide assistance and advice on accurate information in all aspect both educational and non-educational, includes: the institutions, the course, the destination, study and social life, transportation, accomodation, etc.
  • Involved in promotions, campaign and special event activities such as company's exhibition or school expo.
  • Achieve student recruitment target (promoting & selling our services).

• Follow up project request from offshore and do confirmation to the related team regarding their availability to handle the project.
  • Support Unit Manager in creating a weekly and monthly report.
  • Help Unit Manager regarding member management, and support member if there is problem happen in projects or among members.
  • Confirming actual workload and conduct project budget management and checking approval of billing invoice from each offshore project.
  • Giving guidance and support the member in term of Japanese language and checking the report before submitting to Japan.
  • Report project progress to manager and escalate problems that might hinder the project progress immediately.

• Lead and manage project teams using Agile methodologies, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality software solutions.
  • Collaborate closely with stakeholders to define project scope, timelines, and deliverables, leveraging your critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
  • Oversee project execution, track progress, and identify potential risks or bottlenecks, implementing effective solutions.
  • Act as a liaison between technical and non-technical teams, facilitating clear and effective communication.
  • Utilize your leadership abilities to inspire and guide your team, fostering a productive and collaborative environment.
  • Demonstrate strong analytical skills to evaluate project requirements and propose innovative solutions.
  • Work on-site (WFO) to ensure hands-on project oversight and effective team coordination.

• Memasarkan produk kredit pada calon debitur
  • Menganalisa, memastikan calon debitur sesuai dengan target market dan dapat diproses lebih lanjut.
  • Membuat Proposal Kredit.
  • Melakukan proses kredit sesuai dengan koridor dan SLA yang ditentukan.
  • Mengelola debitur yang ada serta mengembangkan referral dari debitur existing
  • Mengevaluasi kondisi kualitas debitur (portofolio kredit, usaha, agunan), termasuk monitoring aging tunggakan.
  • Melakukan penagihan (desk collection, dan kunjungan) atas angsuran kredit.
  • Membuat dan melakukan Rencana Tindak Lanjut pada debitur bermasalah.

We're on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating exceptional employee experiences where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity. As we are growing bigger we are looking for a QA Engineer to configure manual test on our apps and execute stability and performance tests. The chosen candidate will be the one who has both grit and good technical exposure in the QA Engineer.﻿

About the role:

  • Work closely with product, design and engineering teams to understand product requirements and design/execute test plans with complete ownership
  • Develop and maintain automation suites for website, mobile application and backend services
  • Review PRD and engineering design to share useful feedback on improvements before engineering execution cycle
  • Carefully plan out release process including identifying inter-dependencies and backward compatibility
  • Work closely with MLE, DS team in planning, executing and verifying product releases and measuring impact
  • Replicate bugs reported in production on staging environment and help troubleshoot and fix with urgency
  • Help define, drive and implement QA best practices and process
  • Help and review testcase other QA
  • Create test cases and determine test time estimates and make decisions for the best testing process
  • Responding to requests from the design team and management.
  • Meeting with the software/product designers to determine quality assurance parameters.
  • Implementing testing procedures and overseeing the QA process.

Responsible for overseeing the entire software development lifecycle, which includes planning, development, testing, deployment, and maintenance. This role involves building a systematic and integrated infrastructure that supports the continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes. The focus is on creating automated solutions that enhance efficiency, reduce manual intervention, and ensure consistent delivery of high-quality software. This includes selecting appropriate tools, frameworks, and technologies to streamline operations, as well as collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment and effective communication throughout the development process

We are hiring developers for projects with one of the biggest reputable conglomerates in Indonesia.

With us, you will be exposed to many exciting challenges and opportunities to grow through developing our websites, mobile apps, mobile websites, and applications across our business units.

Programming stack we are looking for: QA (Automation)

Do reach out to us if you believe you have the relevant skills, looking forward to working together with you!

• Analyze large amounts of information to discover trends and patterns
  • Analyze data related to or within the scope of finance to develop company business recommendations (Business Improvement)
  • Create data modeling to enrich the analysis of company financial parameters
